paper.title: Updating hypothetical data bases

author.org: Computer Sciences Department, University of Wisconsin-Madison, MadisonWI 53706, USA
Computer Sciences Department, University of Wisconsin-Madison, MadisonWI 53706, USA

paper.abstract: Abstract An extension to hypothetical databases is presented that permits the reinsertion of a previously deleted tuple, while preserving the append-only nature of the differential addition and deletion files.
